entry.title: [EU/CA][Customer service] API/Control panel/Order funnel degraded service
entry.content:
Apr 9, 10:13 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on API/Control panel/Order funnel has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 09/04/2025 09:04 UTC
End time : 09/04/2025 09:15 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a network issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Apr 9, 09:50 UTC
Monitoring - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : 15% error rate on the Canadian Customer Panel, Canadian API, and Canadian Order funnel.
Abnormal error rate for European customers using Canadian services between 04/04/2025 09:04 UTC and 04/04/2025 09:10 UTC, followed by another one between 04/04/2025 09:15 UTC and 04/04/2025 09:15 UTC.
Ongoing Actions : Our technical team is monitoring the incident.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Apr 9, 09:17 UTC
Investigating - Start time: 09/04/2025 09:04 UTC
Service impact: High error rates and high response times have been detected on API impacting Customer Panel, OVHcloud API (eu.api.ovh.com, ca.api.ovh.com) and Order funnel.
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.content:
Jan 16, 20:15 UTC
Completed - We experienced an incident https://customer-service.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/019h0rljxz50 due to an internal network issue that caused the Help Center to be unavailable for approximately 45 minutes. All services have been operational since 16/01/2025 18:14 UTC
